projectList: Security Exchange Platform: A platform for asset owners to track compliance and share requirements transparently.
Gogrow AI: An AI-powered business consulting app for continuous growth.
Degiro Redesign: Brokerage App UX/UI Overhaul (Concept).
Portfolio Agent: An interactive conversational agent embedded in Carlota’s portfolio.

Security Exchange Platform: Problem: Client brought only a conceptual idea with heavy cybersecurity jargon.
Challenge: Translate vague vision into a usable, multi-user platform.
Constraints: No formal research budget; multiple user types with overlapping workflows.
Solutions: Role-based dashboard, compliance alerts, submission system, unified design system.
Process: Rapid onboarding, IA, prototyping, UI design and design system.
Gogrow AI: Problem: In-progress product with inconsistent brand identity and usability gaps.
Constraints: No formal research budget; limited documentation from previous team.
Solutions: Simplified navigation, consolidated branding, positive user feedback.
Process: Product audit, usability fixes, branding consolidation, post-launch walkthroughs.
Degiro Redesign: Problem: Overloaded hierarchy, poor navigation, lack of usability features.
Solutions: Clearer charts, reorganized stock details, improved information architecture.
Process: Concept redesign based on user research.
Portfolio Agent: Problem: Static portfolios don’t showcase conversational design skills.
Challenge: Balance Voiceflow constraints with recruiter-friendly design.
Constraints: Platform quirks in Voiceflow’s new UI.
Solutions: Dynamic agent with buttons + free text, JSON consistency, recruiter-friendly prompts.
Process: Defined recruiter use cases, structured JSON, iterated prompts for polished tone.
